import { useState } from "react"; import { TiLeaf } from "react-icons/ti"; export const SectionEdit = ({ toggle, editSection, section }) => { const [ title, setTitle] = useState(section.title || '') const [ description, setDescription] = useState(section.description || '') return (
{ editSection({ }) }} className="item-form--item-form--2egBT">
 Section 1:
setTitle(event.target.value)} className="form-control" value={title} />
{title.length}
setDescription(event.target.value)} value={description} id="description" className="form-control" />
{description.length}
); };
